long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhances your comic reading experience on Candy.io by:

• Preventing unwanted page resets while reading
• Maintaining your current page position throughout your session
• No configuration needed - works automatically after installation

This extension is designed to make your comic reading smoother and more enjoyable by ensuring you don't lose your place while reading. It's lightweight, focused on improving the reading experience, and doesn't collect any user data.

Perfect for readers who want to enjoy their comics without interruption.

Note: This is an unofficial extension and is not affiliated with Candy.io.
